Reviews.Title: This is by far the worst phones I've bought.
Reviews.Author: Orlando
Reviews.Content: I hate this device especially because the battery has to be recharged several times during the day after just casual use. That is extrememy Inconvenient and annoying. There are other Problems as well. Charging the phone takes forever. Some of the applications download slowly. To improve battery life one has to invest in another bulky battery . It just runs like a sick little phone. I should have known it was too good to be true to get a brand new phone with all these features at such a low price. I don't know Why they continue to sell this device. It is no good.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Phone
Reviews.Author: saeed
Reviews.Content: I purchased this to replace a previous LG Revolution that had broke, and everything went smoothly in transferring my SIM chip over to the new phone.I got this phone for my kid's birthday and she love it. It is her fist smartphone with data. the screen is huge for great display. when she first got it it was so fast. I do like how you can download diff themes for the phone and the sms. it is very "personalize-able". if you stay on the internet or just the phone itself alot the phone will perform excellence. I keep a car charger and just automatically plug it up when I get in the car. It has  a lot of memory and is very easy to use and understand. overall i love it.

Reviews.Title: This phone is the worse phone i've ever had
Reviews.Author: bg callahan
Reviews.Content: i have had many phones and this phone overall sucks. It an extremely slow phone. it loves to freeze up. i plan on getting myself a new one and just putting this under my car tire rolling over it a few times.
